revisions.rev:
{{Infobox person | image = | caption = | birthname = Landry Alexandra Allbright | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1989|8|1}} | birth_place = [[San Dimas, California]], [[United States|U.S.]] | occupation = Actress | yearsactive = 1996â2005 }} '''Landry Alexandra Allbright''' (born August 1, 1989) is an American film and television actress.
Allbright was born in [[San Dimas, California]]. She got her start as the fifth Bridget Forrester on [[CBS]]'s daytime soap ''[[Bold and the Beautiful|The Bold and the Beautiful]]''. She played [[Nicolas Cage]]'s young daughter in the 1997 big screen hit ''[[Con Air]]''. She gained further recognition as Malcolm's first girlfriend, Julie Houlerman, on [[Fox Broadcasting Company|Fox]]'s off-beat single-camera sitcom ''[[Malcolm in the Middle]]''. She had a minor role in [[Ron Howard]]'s ''[[How the Grinch Stole Christmas (film)|How the Grinch Stole Christmas]]'' adaptation. She also had a recurring role as the love interest of Jack's son on ''[[Will & Grace]]''.
==Biography== Allbright has also made guest appearances on ''[[The Invisible Man]]'', ''[[Spin City]]'', ''[[Judging Amy]]'', ''[[7th Heaven]]'', ''[[Without a Trace]]'', ''[[Six Feet Under (TV series)|Six Feet Under]]'', ''[[The Guardian (TV series)|The Guardian]]'', and ''[[The West Wing (TV series)|The West Wing]]''. She also had a role in the 2000 film ''Beautiful'' starring [[Minnie Driver]], [[Kathleen Turner]], [[Joey Lauren Adams]] and [[Hallie Kate Eisenberg]]. She has also appeared in numerous commercials.
Allbright is currently a [[Junior (education)|junior]] at [[Emerson College]] in [[Boston]], [[Massachusetts|MA]].
